patthana23.40:1.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
patthana23.40:1.1_1: sukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.40:2.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ nadukkhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho
patthana23.40:2.1_1: dukkhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana23.40:3.1_0: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ naadukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
patthana23.40:3.1_1: anidassanaappaṭigho adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya sampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
